name: kaoming style LoRA
description:
Lora for the style of kaoming. https://twitter.com/kaoming775

To use a LoRA in automatic1111's web ui you can use this extension:

https://github.com/kohya-ss/sd-webui-additional-networks

Newer versions of the web ui, you can add to your prompt

<lora:kaoming-ep2:1.0>

after adding the LoRA to models\lora (you may have to create the lora folder).

The following hair styles are nice with this style:

hair style 1:
black hair, short hair, curly hair, messy hair
hair style 2:
black hair, blunt bangs, straight hair, long hair

Example prompts:

https://gist.github.com/breakcore2/89a9b182bb0afe8a3dea109913f0ef02

Source:

https://huggingface.co/breakcore2/loras

meta.prompt:
<lora:kaoming-ep2:1>
1girl, 
black hair, blunt bangs, long hair, straight hair,  
red eyes, looking at viewer, (smile:0.8),
(black letterman jacket:1.1), white shirt, confident, open jacket,
black short shorts,
leaning, standing, looking down, hand on hip,
dirty alley, graffiti, night, dimly lit, vending machine, posters, night,
cowboy shot,  dutch angle, foreshortening,
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry,missing fingers,bad hands,missing arms, long neck, Humpbacked, deformed, bad anatomy, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutation, mutated, extra limb, ugly, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, malformed hands, out of focus, long neck, long body, monochrome, watermark, signature, logo, name
